title: Howard Bloom - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/7/20
itunes:title: Howard Bloom - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/7/20
description:
George Noory and author Howard Bloom discuss his time searching for God in the world, an amazing event at a school dance that led him into a career as a top publicist working with Michael Jackson and Prince, and the debilitating disease that left him bedridden for fifteen years.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
